trans-unit.source: Provides an interface for designers to access resource readers and writers for specific <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> resource types.
trans-unit.target: 提供設計工具的介面，存取特定 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 資源型別的資源讀取器 (Reader) 和寫入器 (Writer)。

trans-unit.source: A resource writer or resource reader can be used to serialize or deserialze objects or data according to the specified <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> resource settings.
trans-unit.target: 資源寫入器或資源讀取器可以用來序列化或 deserialze 物件或根據指定的資料<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>資源設定。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates a designer that uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService> to read from and write to resource files in order to configure a property of an associated control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範會使用設計工具<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService>讀取和寫入資源檔，才能設定相關聯的控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> of the resource for which to retrieve a resource reader.
trans-unit.target: 資源的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />，會為其擷取資源讀取器。

trans-unit.source: Locates the resource reader for the specified culture and returns it.
trans-unit.target: 找到指定文化特性的資源讀取器 (Reader)，並將其傳回。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Resources.IResourceReader" /> interface that contains the resources for the culture, or <see langword="null" /> if no resources for the culture exist.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Resources.IResourceReader" /> 介面，包含文化特性的資源，或 <see langword="null" /> (如果文化特性資源不存在)。

trans-unit.source: If no resources are associated with the designer for the specified culture, this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有資源可與指定的文化特性的設計工具相關聯，則這個方法會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> of the resource for which to create a resource writer.
trans-unit.target: 要為其建立資源寫入器的資源的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Locates the resource writer for the specified culture and returns it.
trans-unit.target: 找到指定文化特性 (Culture) 的資源寫入器，並將其傳回。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Resources.IResourceWriter" /> interface for the specified culture.
trans-unit.target: 指定文化特性的 <see cref="T:System.Resources.IResourceWriter" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: This method creates a new resource for the specified culture and destroys an existing resource, if one already exists.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會建立新的資源指定的文化特性，並終結現有的資源，如果已經存在。
